text: bl jhd alkufaar alquran fmin qayl: 'iinah akhlat 'ahlam la hqyqt lha, wamin qayl: 'iinah akhtilaq wakadhab walays whyana, wamin qayl: 'iina mhmdana shaer, whdha aladhi ja' bih sher, wa'iin 'arad minaa 'ana nsddiqh flyjyna bmejzt mhswst knaqt salh, wayat musaa weysa, wama ja' bih alrusul min qblh
